title: Mid lane minions have champion abilities.
body:
Creeps now each have 1 spell. Top and bot remain unchanged. The abilities are very reduced compared to their champion counterparts, but are additional to normal minion attacks.

The first three Melee minions have
1. Garen's E(Reduce dmg)
2. Poppy's W Passive only(Reduced)
3. Katarina's E(Reduced)

Second three,
4. Soraka's E(Reduced, no cost, only casts on other minions)
5. Hiemer Q(Mini-H-28G's that do 4 magic damage, limited to 4 turrets)
6. Janna's E(Reduced, only casts on other minions)

All scale through the game, other than the turrets.

Also, once First tier mid tower is destroyed, the minions split up.

Kat, Poppy, and Janna go 'check' baron. Then continue.

Hiem, Soraka and Garen go 'set up' for dragon, and aid you if your teammates start/are fighting/find enemy fighting dragon. If no one is there, they hold for 4 seconds, then continue.

They then explore through the jungles, and brushes, back to the mid lane, where they mindlessly rush the next turret. But, not before they group up and go in as a team.
